bug.author: benjamin-work
bug.summary: Bug in callback order when using Python < 3.6
bug.description:
The offending line is here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dnouri/skorch/blob/1177be7404ece996d0e6b63982f39b65fe1811e3/skorch/net.py#L366>https://github.com/dnouri/skorch/blob/1177be7404ece996d0e6b63982f39b65fe1811e3/skorch/net.py#L366</denchmark-link>
When dictionary order is not preserved, order of the callbacks may change.
